casebody.data:
JOHNSON
v.
WALKER, et al. No. 302P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. Cynthia L. Van Home, E. Fitzgerald Parnell, III, Charlotte, for Edwin Walker, et al. David C. Pishko, Winston-Salem, for Johnson.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of July 2008 by NC Assoc. of Defense Attys. for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot. By order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of December 2008."
